column4: how to increase the screen resolution on ubuntu 10.04? System > Preferences > Monitor > etc. It only has 800x600, I would like it to be more then 1000x.. Can anyone be kind to assist me with it?
you should install video drivers first, lspci first to verify video card
thank you, i'll give it a try
i typed 'lscpi' in terminal, it replyed some stuff.. USB, VGA etc etc. What am I look for?
